headline: Kite Presents New Data Underscoring Curative Potential of Yescarta速 in Relapsed/Refractory Large B-cell Lymphoma at ASH
summary: SANTA MONICA, Calif., December 08, 2024--Kite, a Gilead Company (Nasdaq: GILD), today announced findings from three new analyses for Yescarta速 (axicabtagene ciloleucel) that demonstrate improved outcomes for people living with relapsed or refractory (R/R) large B-cell lymphoma (LBCL), which were presented at 66th American Society of Hematology (ASH) Annual Meeting & Exposition.

raw.headline: Kite Presents New Data Underscoring Curative Potential of Yescarta速 in Relapsed/Refractory Large B-cell Lymphoma at ASH
